name: aerodactylite
effect: Held: Allows Aerodactyl to Mega Evolve into Mega Aerodactyl.
short_effect: Held: Allows Aerodactyl to Mega Evolve into Mega Aerodactyl.

flavor_text.x_y: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Aerodactyl hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
